title: 14K WHITE GOLD KATE 1.8MM ROUND CUT, LAB DIAMOND RIVIÈRE BRACELET
description: Our daintiest rivière size, exclusively available in 14K gold and lab-grown diamonds. The Kate 1.8MM rivière bracelet features a refined single strand of lab-grown diamonds and a classic 4-prong silhouette.
